DOC.brief_summary: Observatory multicenter, prospective, to support the acute phase of acute coronary syndromes with ST segment elevation ST (myocardial infarction).
DOC.criteria: Any patient with a myocardial infarction less than 48 hours during the November 2010 is eligible and should be considered for inclusion in the study. Every patient who agreed to participate in the study Patients with myocardial infarction after a coronary revascularization, or after cardiac surgery or extra heartbeat. Patient denying that his personal data are subject to treatment automated
